apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji on Apple devices captures a tender moment between two individuals with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones, their lips gently meeting in a kiss. The figures are rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, giving them a warm and affectionate appearance. Realistic lighting highlights the gentle embrace, conveying a sense of love, intimacy, and heartfelt affection, perfect for expressing romantic feelings or a sweet goodbye.
